data.title: Julia Roberts And Tom Hanks Movies List – Just Speak News
data.text:
Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks are two of Hollywood’s most beloved actors, each with an impressive filmography that has spanned decades. From romantic comedies to dramas, these two stars have captivated audiences with their talent and charisma. In this article, we will take a closer look at Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks movies list, as well as explore some interesting facts about these iconic actors.

Julia Roberts Movies List:

1. Pretty Woman (1990) – Perhaps one of Julia Roberts’ most iconic roles, she played the role of Vivian Ward, a prostitute who is hired by a wealthy businessman to be his escort for a week.

2. Erin Brockovich (2000) – Roberts won an Academy Award for her portrayal of Erin Brockovich, a real-life legal clerk who helped win a major environmental lawsuit against a California power company.

3. Notting Hill (1999) – In this romantic comedy, Roberts starred opposite Hugh Grant as a famous actress who falls in love with a bookstore owner.

4. My Best Friend’s Wedding (1997) – Roberts showcased her comedic chops in this romantic comedy about a woman who realizes she’s in love with her best friend just as he’s about to get married.

5. Steel Magnolias (1989) – Roberts was part of an ensemble cast in this drama about a group of women in a small Southern town who bond over love, loss, and friendship.

Tom Hanks Movies List:

1. Forrest Gump (1994) – Hanks won his second Academy Award for his portrayal of Forrest Gump, a kind-hearted man with a low IQ who has a series of remarkable adventures.

2. Cast Away (2000) – In this survival drama, Hanks played a FedEx executive who is stranded on a deserted island after a plane crash.

3. Saving Private Ryan (1998) – Hanks starred as Captain John Miller, who leads a group of soldiers on a mission to rescue a paratrooper behind enemy lines during World War II.

4. Philadelphia (1993) – Hanks won his first Academy Award for his role as a lawyer who is fired from his firm after revealing he has AIDS.

5. Big (1988) – Hanks played a young boy who magically transforms into an adult overnight in this heartwarming comedy.

Interesting Facts about Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks:

1. Julia Roberts was the first actress to earn $20 million for a film, for her role in “Erin Brockovich” in 2000. Tom Hanks followed suit, becoming the first actor to earn the same amount for “Cast Away” in the same year.

2. Both Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks have won Academy Awards for their performances in iconic films. Roberts won for “Erin Brockovich” and Hanks won for “Philadelphia” and “Forrest Gump.”

3. Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks have never starred in a film together, despite both being major stars in Hollywood. Fans have long awaited a collaboration between these two actors.

4. Julia Roberts was named the Most Beautiful Woman in the World by People magazine a record-breaking five times, in 1991, 2000, 2005, 2010, and 2017.

5. Tom Hanks is known for his close relationship with director Steven Spielberg, having worked together on multiple films such as “Saving Private Ryan,” “Catch Me If You Can,” and “Bridge of Spies.”

6. Julia Roberts’ breakthrough role was in the 1988 film “Mystic Pizza,” which helped launch her career as a leading actress in Hollywood.

7. Tom Hanks got his start in television, starring in the sitcom “Bosom Buddies” in the early 1980s before transitioning to film and becoming one of the most successful actors in Hollywood.

8. Julia Roberts has been nominated for four Academy Awards, winning once for “Erin Brockovich.” Tom Hanks has been nominated for five Academy Awards, winning twice for “Philadelphia” and “Forrest Gump.”

9. Both Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks are known for their philanthropy work, supporting various charities and causes throughout their careers. Roberts is a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador, while Hanks is a supporter of veterans’ causes and environmental organizations.

Common Questions about Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks:

1. Have Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks ever worked together on a film?

No, Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks have never starred in a film together, despite both being major stars in Hollywood.

2. How many Academy Awards has Julia Roberts won?

Julia Roberts has won one Academy Award for her performance in “Erin Brockovich.”

3. What is Tom Hanks’ most famous film role?

Tom Hanks is perhaps best known for his role as Forrest Gump in the 1994 film of the same name.

4. Has Julia Roberts ever starred in a romantic comedy with Hugh Grant?

Yes, Julia Roberts starred alongside Hugh Grant in the 1999 romantic comedy “Notting Hill.”

5. What charity work is Tom Hanks known for?

Tom Hanks is a supporter of veterans’ causes and environmental organizations.

6. How many times has Julia Roberts been named the Most Beautiful Woman in the World by People magazine?

Julia Roberts has been named the Most Beautiful Woman in the World by People magazine five times, in 1991, 2000, 2005, 2010, and 2017.

7. Which film earned Julia Roberts her first $20 million paycheck?

Julia Roberts earned her first $20 million paycheck for her role in “Erin Brockovich.”

8. What was Tom Hanks’ breakthrough role in film?

Tom Hanks’ breakthrough role in film was in the 1988 comedy “Big.”

9. How many Academy Awards has Tom Hanks won?

Tom Hanks has won two Academy Awards, for his performances in “Philadelphia” and “Forrest Gump.”

10. What is the title of the film in which Julia Roberts played a prostitute opposite Richard Gere?

The film is called “Pretty Woman.”

11. Which film did Tom Hanks star in that was set during World War II?

Tom Hanks starred in the war drama “Saving Private Ryan,” set during World War II.

12. How many nominations has Julia Roberts received for an Academy Award?

Julia Roberts has been nominated for four Academy Awards.

13. What television show did Tom Hanks star in before transitioning to film?

Tom Hanks starred in the sitcom “Bosom Buddies” before transitioning to film.

14. What is the title of the film in which Tom Hanks played a FedEx executive stranded on a deserted island?

The film is called “Cast Away.”

15. What real-life figure did Julia Roberts portray in the film “Erin Brockovich”?

Julia Roberts portrayed legal clerk Erin Brockovich in the film.

16. Which director has Tom Hanks worked with multiple times throughout his career?

Tom Hanks has worked with director Steven Spielberg on multiple films.

17. What is the name of the film in which Julia Roberts played a famous actress who falls in love with a bookstore owner?

The film is called “Notting Hill.”

In summary, Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks are two of Hollywood’s most talented and beloved actors, with a filmography that includes a wide range of genres and iconic roles. From romantic comedies to dramas, these two stars have showcased their versatility and charisma on the big screen. Their impressive careers, combined with their philanthropy work and lasting impact on the industry, make Julia Roberts and Tom Hanks true Hollywood legends.
